name: They Keep me Rollin' [GMTK-2020]
description:
Our archenemy has turned our house into a wheelhouse!

Now our mission is to make a long journey of 25 days to the capital of the wizard city so that someone can restore the house to its normal state.

They Keep me Rollin' is a survival game with crafting, collecting items, lots of crazy and fun!

Our house won't stop spinning like a wheel and inside we will have all our constructions, materials and objects to survive during the trip. BEWARE! all objects act according to the gravity and the speed of the wheel. Before getting dizzy, use the anchor to make the house stop for a few seconds.

CONTROLS

  • Art Direction: Hector Toro (@Narehop)
  • Programming: Codemanu (@CodemanuPro)
  • Game Design: Hector Toro, CodeManu
  • Music, SFX: Jose Ramón "Bibiki" García (@BibikiGL)
